person.persName: Oliver Perry Herndon (Knox County physician and attorney)

body.p: A prominent, Kentucky-born physician and attorney in Barbourville, Knox County, Kentucky. Son of Benjamin F. Herndon, a Knox County Justice of the Peace, and Theodosia Renfro. Resided in Clear Creek District, Knox County, Kentucky.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Clear Creek District, p. 153.
